title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tyson Fury Sounds Off
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tyson Fury Sounds Off
description:
Joining Mannix this week are Ak and Barak, the co-hosts of the DAZN Boxing Show. Mannix, Ak and Barak discuss Anthony Joshua's trainer change, the possibility of a Joshua-Deontay Wilder fight, Gervonta Davis's year ahead, Jermell Charlo's comments towards Terence Crawford, Amir Khan's future and more. Later, Tyson Fury joins to discuss his fight with Dillian Whyte, how close he is to retirement and more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Joining Mannix this week are Ak and Barak, the co-hosts of the DAZN Boxing Show. Mannix, Ak and Barak discuss Anthony Joshua's trainer change, the possibility of a Joshua-Deontay Wilder fight, Gervonta Davis's year ahead, Jermell Charlo's comments towards Terence Crawford, Amir Khan's future and more. Later, Tyson Fury joins to discuss his fight with Dillian Whyte, how close he is to retirement and more.
